data: Tycho Sleator Assoc Prof Of Physics Ph.D. 1986 (physics), M.A. 1982 (physics), California (Berkeley); B.S. 1979 (physics), Illinois (Urbana). Atomic and optical physics, optical manipulation of atoms, fundamental aspects of quantum mechanics. External Affiliations American Physical Society, American Association for the Advancement of Science. Fellowships/Honors David and Lucile Packard Fellowship, 1993; Alexander von Humboldt Research Fellowship, 1990. T. Sleator, O. Carnal, T. Pfau, A. Faulstich, H. Takuma, J. Mlynek, "Atom Interferometry with Mechanical Structures," in Laser Spectroscopy X , edited by M. Ducloy, E. Giacobino, and G. Camy (World Scientific, Singapore, 1992) p. 264 T. Sleator, T. Pfau, V. Balykin, O. Carnal, and J. Mlynek, "Experimental demonstration of the optical Stern-Gerlach effect," Phys. Rev. Lett 68 , 1996 (1992). T. Sleator, T. Pfau, V. Balykin, and J. Mlynek, "Imaging and focusing of an atomic beam with a large period standing light wave," Appl. Phys. B 54 , 375 (1992). B. Dubetsky, P.R. Berman, and T. Sleator, "Grating stimulated echo," Phys. Rev. A 46 , R2213 (1992). T. Sleator and M. Wilkens, "Quantum-nondemolition Measurement of Atomic Momentum", Phys. Rev. A 48 , 3286 (1993). T. Sleator and H. Weinfurter, "Realizable Universal Quantum Logic Gates", Phys. Rev. Lett. 74 , 4087 (1995). Tycho Sleator Assoc Prof Of Physics tycho.sleator@nyu.edu 726 Broadway, Room 972 Phone: (212) 998-7764 Personal Homepage Lab Homepage
